name: Kettle
description:
Client is a single parent with 2 schooling children living in a 2-room HDB rental flat. Client cannot work due to multiple health issues. As she is not working, the family relies on financial assistance from various formal agencies to make ends meet which helps her cope with the basic living expenses.  Client faces challenges to cope with additional expenses beyond the basic living expenses especially in view of increase in cost of living standards and higher children’s educational expenses who are in secondary and tertiary level. Client reported that her kettle recently spoilt.
Due to her financial situation, she does not have the resources to buy a kettle. Client is open to receive a secondhand kettle that is still in good working condition.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

passiton.name: Philips Small Kettle
passiton.description: Small Philips kettle (750L)in working condition
passiton.location: Admiralty Road, Kranji, Woodgrove, Woodlands

name: Single Mattress
description: Family consists of father and teenage daughter. Its a single parent family and the family is from a low income family. Father has health issues and is unfit for work and family is reliant on financial assistance to get by. Their cat just had a case of fleas and as such they had to dispose the couch which the daughter was sleeping on as it was contaminated. Now she sleeps on the floor as father has no money to buy another mattress or sofabed for her and her back is aching as she has been sleeping like that for 2 weeks. It would be very helpful if a kind donor can donate a new mattress to the daughter to sleep on (they prefer new as now they are a bit sensitive about hygiene due to the flea issue). Family lives in a 2 room flat. Please feel free to reach out to me for more information if needed. Thank you!

passiton.name: Super Single Size Mattress
passiton.description:
Super Single Size cushion type mattress.  
Giving out as we are moving out. 
Will be giving out together with the sheet shown in the photo.
As I still using it, I only can give out on 28 Mar (Thursday), 29 Mar (Friday PH), 30 Mar (Saturday). 28 Mar delivery prefered.

I am able to arrange logistic to deliver to the need (islandwide). 
I will pay for the delivery fee. 

I can be contacted via email or whatapps. Thank you

Note : the big stain shown as kids spill water.
passiton.location: Bouna Vista, Clementi, Dover, Hong Leong Garden, Pasir Panjang, West Coast
